title: I can't create my PBE account
body:
So i was just recently accepted for a PBE account (https://gyazo.com/b7ea62a557ac7c0588ceb6f7000bac21) however everytime I press the "CREATE YOUR PBE ACCOUNT" button it takes forever to load the page and then shows ERROR: 500 (https://gyazo.com/0151e68c2f1a85eee0eb7a043e6b7182) Can anyone explain how I can create my PBE account? 

Thanks for your time, this has really been annoying me.

replies.body: We've been having a few issues with the PBE signup over the past few days, but we're still working to get those ironed out. In the meantime, you could try using a VPN such as [**CyberGhost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) to see if we can get your account created and get you to testing!
It looks like they are having issues with the PBE [website](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)
